pages.text: $(o)Toathings$() adds new naturally generating features to Birch Forests to add liveliness the biome.$(br2)$(l)$(n)Fallen Birch Trees$()$(br)When exploring Birch Forests, you may occasionally discover fallen trees in the form of hollow birch logs. These fallen trees are commonly covered in moss and mushrooms
$(o)A Fallen Birch tree made out of hollow log blocks.
